column3: the afterparty (social meeting after the main party)
to wander about, to go around
going to and coming from the office
to chop in thin slices or dice
rice-cake steamed on a layer of pine needles
snack, food eaten between regular meals
to be aged, to be old
to be various, to be diverse
medicine (as a major or course of study)
to have been a long time since...
an uncle, the elder brother of one´s father
an aunt, the wife of the elder brother of one´s father
A younger brother of one´s father
an aunt, the wife of one´s father´s younger brother
the husband of one's father's sister
